mapper.insert: insert into member_suspension(member_no, member_suspension_days, member_suspension_lift_date, member_suspension_status, member_suspension_times, member_suspension_content) values(#{memberNo}, #{memberSuspensionDays}, sysdate+#{memberSuspensionDays}, 0, 1, #{memberSuspensionContent})
mapper.update: update member_suspension set member_suspension_status=1, member_suspension_lift_date=sysdate where member_no=#{memberNo} and member_suspension_status=0

update member_suspension set member_suspension_status=0, member_suspension_times=member_suspension_times+1, member_suspension_days=#{memberSuspensionDays}, member_suspension_lift_date=sysdate+#{memberSuspensionDays} where member_no=#{memberNo}
